Bio

I am a passionate Front-End Web Developer from Manchester, UK. I code using HTML5, CSS3 & Javascript (along with Bootstrap, Materialize & SCSS) to build professional looking, functional websites & small web applications. I also have experience using APIs (Google Maps etc.) I'm constantly learning new technologies and push myself daily to be a better developer than yesterday. Check out my Portfolio on this site to see the kind of work I can do.

My primary clientele at the moment are small businesses & creative individuals. Feel free to get in touch if you are interested in working with me or have any questions!

Below are the services I currently provide.

Web design & Development

Front-End with Optional Mail Host

I can design & develop professional & functional websites for your business/creative interests. We'll have a brief chat to discuss the specifics (page info, colours, logos, costs etc) & then I'll get to work.

I am currently front-end only which means I don't deal with sever-side programming, however I can offer the use of a 'mail host' for your site visitors to contact you directly via your webpage.

Webpage Editing

Changes & Bug Fixes

If you currently have a website & are looking for a developer to make some changes or fix some bug issues, I can help. I charge an hourly rate & aim for a quick a turn around.

Outsourcing

Small/Partial Projects

Aimed at other freelance Web Developers/businesses! If your work load is getting a bit too much I will happily help out.

I develop small web components on a regular basis so can take partial projects off your hands, or if any webpages need building to a specific design using HTML, CSS & Javascript I can give my input.
